thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 02 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ASGN Says Entered Fifth Amendment To Amend Existing Credit Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ASGN Says Entered Fifth Amendment To Amend Existing Credit Facility
text:
April 2 (Reuters) - ASGN Inc:
* ASGN INC SAYS ENTERED FIFTH AMENDMENT; THE FIFTH AMENDMENT AMENDS THE EXISTING CREDIT FACILITY - SEC FILING
* AFTER EFFECT TO AMENDMENT, EXISTING CREDIT FACILITY CONSISTS OF A $200.0 MLN, FIVE-YEAR REVOLVING LOAN FACILITY
* FIFTH AMENDMENT ALSO PROVIDES ABILITY TO INCREASE LOAN FACILITIES BY AMOUNT NOT TO EXCEED THE SUM OF $300.0 MILLION
* AFTER EFFECT TO AMENDMENT, EXISTING CREDIT FACILITY ALSO CONSISTS OF A $1.4 BILLION TERM B LOAN FACILITY THAT CONSISTS OF TWO TRANCHES Source text - bit.ly/2IkQP84 Further company coverage:
